solution_line_template: The box weighs {total_weight} pounds and she's going to use half of it to make applesauce so she'll use {total_weight}/{applesauce_divisor} = <<{total_weight}/{applesauce_divisor}={applesauce_weight}>>{applesauce_weight} pounds for applesauce

The box weighs {total_weight} pounds and she'll use {applesauce_weight} pounds for applesauce so that leaves {total_weight}-{applesauce_weight} = <<{total_weight}-{applesauce_weight}={remaining_apples_for_pies}>>{remaining_apples_for_pies} pounds of apples

She has {remaining_apples_for_pies} pounds of apples and she needs {pounds_per_pie} pounds to make a pie so she can make {remaining_apples_for_pies}/{pounds_per_pie} = <<{remaining_apples_for_pies}/{pounds_per_pie}={num_pies}>>{num_pies} pies
